entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SSE 16 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Rain or periods of snow before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries or a few rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
